cta.descriptionFirst: Explore our selection of professional coaches and book your first coaching session.
cta.descriptionNext: Continue your learning with new coaches or book a new session.

progress.title: Your progress tracking
progress.subtitle: Visualize your evolution and coaching statistics
progress.description: Your personalized progress tracking will be available soon

sessions.title: My Sessions
sessions.subtitle: View your booked coaching sessions
sessions.timezone: Times are displayed in your timezone

upcoming.title: Upcoming sessions
upcoming.emptyHint: Explore available coaches to book a session

profile.title: Personal information
profile.subtitle: Update your profile information
profile.timezoneHint: Used to schedule your coaching sessions

discord.title: Discord connection
discord.subtitle: Connect your Discord account to access your session rooms

benefits.title: Benefits of Discord connection
benefits.access: Direct access to private rooms for your coaching sessions
benefits.communication: Voice and text communication with your coach

security.title: Security and privacy
security.description: Only one Edgemy account can be linked to a Discord account. Your Discord ID is stored securely and is only used to create your private session rooms.

discord.joinServerHint: Required to access your session rooms

toast.saveSuccessDescription: Your settings have been updated successfully

loading.title: Loading your coaches
loading.subtitle: We are preparing your session history and coach insights.

section.title: My coaches
section.subtitle: Review your session history, reopen private channels and keep in touch with your coaches.

metrics.totalSessionsHint: All the sessions completed with your coaches
metrics.lastSessionHint: Date of your most recent session

empty.title: You haven't worked with a coach yet
empty.description: Explore our catalogue of experts to book your first session and accelerate your progress.
empty.highlight1: Benefit from personalized support tailored to your level and goals.
empty.highlight2: Review key hands with coaches specialized in MTT, Cash Game or Spin & Go.
empty.highlight3: Receive a clear training plan after each session.
empty.highlight4: Access exclusive resources shared by the coaches.

guide.title: Recommended action plan
guide.description: Follow these steps to find the right coach and schedule your first session.

step1.title: Explore coaches
step1.description: Filter by game format, stakes and specialties to identify the best profiles.

step2.title: Book a session
step2.description: Choose an available slot and confirm your booking in a few clicks.

step3.title: Prepare yourself
step3.description: Share your goals and hands to review to maximize the session's impact.

card.sessionsCount: {count, plural, one {# session completed} other {# sessions completed}}

channel.tooltip: Go to your Discord room to keep the conversation going and share resources.
